name: Collaborative Computing
description: The information system prohibits remote activation of collaborative computing mechanisms and provides an explicit indication of use to the local users.
supplemental_guidance: Collaborative computing mechanisms include, for example, video and audio conferencing capabilities. Explicit indication of use includes, for example, signals to local users when cameras and/or microphones are activated.
enhancements: (1) The information system provides physical disconnect of camera and microphone in a manner that supports ease of use.

rev5.name: Collaborative Computing Devices and Applications
rev5.changes_from_rev4: Control text adds 'and applications' to both the title and control text
